name: Sarah's Marvelous Nightmare
description:
Sarah’s is a normal girl and like every girl of her age she is fascinated with social media and the possibility of connecting with friends and other people. But in our society the dependence of this type of media could have a disastrous impact on our lives. Specially with problems like social pressure and cyber bulling.

Our game aims to simulate a situation of social pressure that comes from these media, by forcing the player to follow a list of interaction rules that increase day after day.

Controls:

User your mouse to click to like on specific posts.
